plugins.title: Opensubtitles
plugins.description: Installing this plugin will make Showtime automatically search for subtitles online at opensubtitles.org when playing a movie

plugins.author: andreus sebes (andreus.sebes@gmail.com)
plugins.title: WEBmedia
plugins.description:
WEBmedia plugin for Showtime is a internet source media reader

Can read RSS feeds, Imagecast, Podcast, Videocast, Live TV/Radio (RTMP), Web Resources and Web Folders.
